E91 DIPLOMAT A

E91 DIPLOMAT A LUX


Multi-accessoried, fast and easy to operate, Faema's state-of-the-art electronics provide quick, one touch portion setting for espresso, cappuccino and hot water. This means maximum time and energy savings for you. The electronic control system guarantees optimum precision and reliability for all functions, a high-tech product resulting from the most modern industrial design keeps top quality in every cup.
The Faema E91 Diplomat A features a modern and original design by Giugiaro Design with care to the finest details. For clients demanding no less then the best in quality and appearance, the E91 Diplomat A is available in the LUX polished brass version as well.
 
Specifications
  • automatic espresso coffee machine with programmable portion control
  • complete with inventory control for immediate readout of quantities of espresso, cappuccino and hot water produced
  • programmable on/off timer
  • programmable coffee doses via micro-processor with push button control
  • Cappuccino Magic with programmable dosing of milk desired
  • hot water spout with programmable dosing of water desired
  • 2 additional steam spouts
  • electronic water level control
  • built-in volumetric water pump and external water softner
  • luminous digital display showing boiler pressure, time, programming modes and inventory
  • consumes 10% less electricity than conventional machine due to its sensor thermostat control
  • available in 2, 3 & 4 group versions
  • die-cast aluminium, stainless steel and makrolon casing
 

TECHNICAL DATA
